h1. ThumbnailRESTService

* {noformat}{restcontextname}{noformat}: The context name of rest webapplication which is deployed to the "{noformat}{portalname}{noformat}" portal.
{note}

|*getCustomImage* |{noformat}{portalname}/{restcontextname}/thumbnailImage/custom/{size}/{repoName}/{workspaceName}/{nodePath}/{noformat}|size{example}{example}repoName {example}{example}workspaceName{example}{example}nodePath |String {example}{example}String {example}{example}String {example}{example}String |Returns an image with the custom size.|
